      • createComment

        @PostMapping
@ResponseStatus(CREATED)
public Comment createComment​(@RequestBody @Valid
                             @Valid CreateCommentRequest createCommentRequest)
        Controller for processing the creation of a new comment.
        Parameters:
        createCommentRequest - request to create a new comment.
        Returns:
        entity - comment.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException - if the fields in the request are filled incorrectly.
        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.exc.InvalidFormatException - if the news ID field in the request is filled incorrectly.

      • readComment

        @GetMapping("/details/{id}")
public Comment readComment​(@PathVariable
                           java.util.UUID id)
        Processing controller for reading the details of a single comment.
        Parameters:
        id - UUID identifier of the entity - comment.
        Returns:
        entity - comment.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.method.annotation.MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException - if the comment ID is not set correctly.
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if no comment is found for the given identifier in the request.

      • updateComment

        @PutMapping("/{id}")
public Comment updateComment​(@PathVariable
                             java.util.UUID id,
                             @RequestBody @Valid
                             @Valid UpdateCommentRequest updateCommentRequest)
        Comment update processing controller.
        Parameters:
        id - UUID identifier of the entity - comment.
        updateCommentRequest - request to update the comment.
        Returns:
        entity - comment.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.method.annotation.MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException - if the comment ID is not set correctly.
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if no comment or news was found for the given identifier in the request.
        org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException - if the fields in the request are filled incorrectly.
        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.exc.InvalidFormatException - if the news ID field in the request is filled incorrectly.

      • deleteComment

        @DeleteMapping("/{id}")
public java.util.UUID deleteComment​(@PathVariable
                                    java.util.UUID id)
        Comment deletion processing controller.
        Parameters:
        id - UUID identifier of the entity - comment.
        Returns:
        UUID identifier of the entity - comment.
        Throws:
        org.springframework.web.method.annotation.MethodArgumentTypeMismatchException - if the comment ID is not set correctly.
        javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException - if no comment is found for the given identifier in the request.
